js.jquery_tooltip
*****************

Introduction
============

This library packages `jQuery Tooltip`_ for `fanstatic`_. It is aware of different modes (normal, minified).

.. _`fanstatic`: http://fanstatic.org
.. _`jQuery Tooltip`: http://bassistance.de/jquery-plugins/jquery-plugin-tooltip/

This requires integration between your web framework and ``fanstatic``,
and making sure that the original resources (shipped in the ``resources``
directory in ``js.jquery_tooltip``) are published to some URL.
